para.text: can be inserted directly into your drawing as a kind of table.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The table of contents is like a list with all the pages in your project.

para.text: To create a table of contents, select the

para.text: menu. The following window then appears:
